author: cnbc.com
title: Western Asset Mortgage: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
PASADENA, Calif. (AP) _ Western Asset Mortgage Capital Corp. (WMC) on Monday reported first-quarter earnings of $21.7 million.
The Pasadena, California-based company said it had net income of 52 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were 34 cents per share.
The real estate investment company posted revenue of $39.7 million in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $19 million.
Western Asset Mortgage shares have risen almost 2 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Monday, shares hit $10.11, rising slightly in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on WMC at https://www.zacks.com/ap/WMC
